SCTX:
Begin sapriusAttack

short state
short NoLore

;these guys get enabled from rescuing saprius entius
;they start hidden

if ( state == 0 )
	disable
	set state to 10

elseif ( state == 10 )
	if ( GetDisabled == 0 )	;get enabled from dialogue
		set state to 20
	endif

elseif ( state == 20 )
	StartCombat "Saprius Entius"
	Set state to -1

endif

End
